section.title: Upgrade Methods
section.para: There are two upgrade methods for JBoss Developer Studio. The method you use depends on whether you are using JBoss Developer Studio or JBoss Developer Studio BYOE.

warning.para: Before upgrading JBoss Developer Studio, you are advised to back up your workspace. In addition to your project files, your workspace contains meta-data about customized setting and preferences for JBoss Developer Studio or Eclipse. To back up your workspace, either copy the workspace directory to a backup location or save it as a compressed file.
